David - May 8, 2012 - Version 2.4.0
Great work
Works really well on flashed droid 2 (cm9 rom). Love the conservative governor and the profiles. For some reason it won't let the cpu drop bellow 200mhz as a min. It did for a bit then stopped. Still works great otherwise. Max 1.2ghz overclock

May 22, 2012 - Version 2.4.0
Don't waste your money
used to work all the time and was great. now it force closes all the time and i can't do anything (couldn't do that much to start either cause of the phone i have). is not worth the money and headaches. don't buy it, just find another app. only thing this has going for it is it looks flashy, other than that it's complete junk.

Nick - April 11, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.4.0
Amazing on Droid X
Works instantly with root. With profiles I can set it to underclock when temps reach too high or battery reaches a certain level. When gaming I crank it up to 1.25 / 1.35 and it flies. Returns an error when background data is off, it requires it to make sure it's not a free version. Obviously not a problem just a side note.

jeffrey - May 6, 2012 - Version 2.4.0
Jrummy= (GOD)roid
Works great, bought it as my first oc app 2 years ago, and love and use every extra feature that's included and will for years to come. Its perfect... and people- if you get a new phone, don't expect it to just oc your device simply because it worked on the last one. There's more to this than just installing an app. There's a lot of people working on the razr right now so just chill. Or do it yourself ;)
